LanguageData.Cults_SawCarcosa.stages.0.label: saw Carcosa
LanguageData.Cults_SawCarcosa.stages.0.description: Twin suns sank behind waves of clouds, and in the distance, I witnessed the lost city of Carcosa.
LanguageData.Cults_ObservedNightmareTree.stages.0.des: That tree... it wasn't there before. I'm sure of it.
LanguageData.Cults_ObservedNightmareTreeCultist.stage: Such wonderous markings must be preserved.
LanguageData.Cults_ObservedNightmareMonolith.stages.0: How did it get here? What do those symbols mean? That thing gives me the creeps.
LanguageData.Cults_ObservedNightmareMonolithCultist.s: The symbols are a sign from the gods. We should preserve them.
LanguageData.Cults_FoundedCult.stages.0.label: founded the local cult
LanguageData.Cults_FoundedCultMood.stages.0.label: founded a cult
LanguageData.Cults_FoundedCultMood.stages.0.descripti: I have to tell everyone. Everything is so clear now, and they must know the truth. Great things await us.
LanguageData.Cults_JoinedCult.stages.0.label: joined the local cult
LanguageData.Cults_JoinedCultMood.stages.0.label: joined a cult
LanguageData.Cults_JoinedCultMood.stages.0.descriptio: I'm part of something greater now.
LanguageData.Cults_MadeInvestigation.stages.0.label: investigated strange things
LanguageData.Cults_MadeInvestigationMood.stages.0.des: ι нανє ℓσσкє∂ υρσи αℓℓ тнαт тнє υиινєяѕє нαѕ тσ нσℓ∂ σf нσяяσя, αи∂ єνєи тнє ѕкιєѕ σf ѕρяιиg αи∂ тнє fℓσωєяѕ σf ѕυммєя мυѕт єνєя αfтєяωαя∂ вє ρσιѕσи тσ мє.̤̤
LanguageData.Cults_BlackoutBook.stages.0.label: acquired occult grimoire
LanguageData.Cults_BlackoutBook.stages.0.description: I blacked out. I don't remember. Afterwards, when I ran my fingers over the book, I could feel it calling my name. Am I going mad?
LanguageData.Cults_SafePreach.stages.0.label: shared beliefs
LanguageData.Cults_DangerPreach.stages.0.label: offended beliefs
We had to take matters into our own hands. A cult? That should be stopped.
I can't be in this place! What if I'm next?!
LanguageData.Cults_ExecutedFamily.stages.0.label: executed {0}
LanguageData.Cults_ExecutedFamily.stages.0.descriptio: What have I done in the name of the faith? My own family...
LanguageData.Cults_ExecutedPet.stages.0.label: sacrificed my pet {0}
LanguageData.Cults_ExecutedPet.stages.0.description: I killed them for our faith, and I feel hollow.
LanguageData.Cults_ExecutedFriend.stages.0.label: executed my friend {0}
LanguageData.Cults_ExecutedFriend.stages.0.descriptio: They died serving a worthy cause. Even so, I feel so empty inside.
LanguageData.Cults_SacrificedFamily.stages.0.label: my family member {0} was sacrified
LanguageData.Cults_SacrificedFriend.stages.0.label: my friend {0} was sacrified
LanguageData.Cults_SacrificedPet.stages.0.label: my pet {0} was sacrificed
LanguageData.Cults_SacrificedPet.stages.0.description: They killed them. Those heartless bastards.
LanguageData.Cults_SacrificedRival.stages.0.label: my rival {0} was sacrified
LanguageData.Cults_SacrificedRival.stages.0.descripti: What a great turn of events! I'm glad they're gone.
LanguageData.Cults_WitnessedSacrificeBloodlust.stages: Let the blood flow! Ia! Ia!
LanguageData.Cults_InnocentAttendedFailedSacrifice.st: Have we become monsters? We murdered them for nothing!
LanguageData.Cults_HeldSermon.stages.0.label: held sermon
LanguageData.Cults_HeldSermon.stages.0.description: I felt powerful to stand up and deliver the services. Hopefully the others enjoyed it as well.
When the words reached my ears, my mind, body, and soul were swept away to another world. Could that be the promised land?
LanguageData.Cults_AttendedGreatSermonAsCultist.stage: For a moment, I felt its divine presence amongst us.
LanguageData.Cults_AttendedGoodSermonAsCultist.stages: I could almost hear something beyond this world.
LanguageData.Cults_AttendedAwfulSermonAsCultist.stage: I could give a better sermon than that!
LanguageData.Cults_AttendedIncredibleSermonAsInnocent: I felt IT calling through the preacher's voice. What was that -thing-?! This must be some kind of trick.\n\nMeta Info: Good sermons slowly increase cult mindedness of other colonists.
LanguageData.Cults_AttendedGreatSermonAsInnocent.stag: The things the preacher said... They can't be true... but what if they are? Have I been wrong all my life?\n\nMeta Info: Good sermons slowly increase cult mindedness of other colonists.
LanguageData.Cults_AttendedGoodSermonAsInnocent.stage: I cannot shake the words, but I cannot accept them either.\n\nMeta Info: Good sermons slowly increase cult mindedness of other colonists.
LanguageData.Cults_AttendedDecentSermonAsInnocent.sta: I doubt they were at all true, but it was something about the way they spoke. Such confidence in madness is commendable.\n\nMeta Info: Good sermons slowly increase cult mindedness of other colonists.
LanguageData.Cults_AttendedAwfulSermonAsInnocent.stag: Do people really believe this stuff? Are they insane?
I spent some time in an impressive temple.
I spent some time in an impressive temple.
I spent some time in a very impressive temple.
I spent some time in an extremely impressive temple. I could stay there forever.
I spent some time in an unbelievably impressive temple. I could stay there forever.
LanguageData.Cults_PrayedInImpressiveTemple.stages.10: I spent some time in a miraculously wonderful temple. I could stay there forever.
LanguageData.Cults_PrayedInImpressiveTemple.stages.11: I just made my prayers in the best temple one could ever imagine. I could stay there forever.
LanguageData.Cults_SawAurora.stages.0.label: beautiful aurora
